"Deactivate the Time Bombs": "Deactivate all the time bombs!"
"Deactivate all the time bombs!"
"Half the time bombs remain."
"Only one time bomb remains."
"$(0) has deactivated a time bomb."
"A time bomb has been deactivated."
"$(0) has earned $(1) EXP and $(2) meseta."

"We've identified several time bombs put in place
by Darkers! You'll need to deal with them before
they explode."

"Time bombs pack a punch, but if you're able
to figure out how they're put together, it's possible
to deactivate them. You'll need to inspect them."

"All time bombs have been deactivated.
A job well done."

"The time bombs have exploded!
Are you okay?!"

"You've deactivated half of the time bombs.
Keep it up!"
"There's only one time bomb left!"

"The time bomb in question has cooled down and
it's no longer dangerous. The deactivation was
a success."

"It seems there was a mistake in your input,
but you won't be able to try again right away."

"There's only 30 seconds left before they
blow! Deal with them as fast as you can."

"We're currently at work dealing with some
Darker time bombs. Please assist!"

"Blast... looks like we've got some Darker
time bombs on our hands. Hurry, we'll need
to take these things out before they blow."

"These things are a nasty bunch and pack a lot
of power, but they can be deactivated. You'll
have to do it before the time runs out."

"Excellent! All time bombs have been
deactivated. Well done."

"The heat readings are off the chart!
Were you unable to stop them?!"

"Excellent, you've deactivated half of them.
Keep it up!"

"Only one time bomb left.
Don't let your guard down until they've
all been deactivated."

"The reading for this bomb has weakened.
....Looks like you've deactivated it."

"Blast, something went wrong...
Looks like you'll have to wait a bit before
you can try the deactivation code again."

"Hurry! There's only 30 more seconds until
the bombs go up in smoke."

"Ah, you've arrived at the perfect time.
We're currently dealing with some Darker
time bombs. Think you can lend a hand?"

"Warning! We're getting some dangerous readings!
Looks like we've got some Darker time bombs
on our hands... and a lot of 'em!"

"B-but don't panic yet! You can
stop these things before they go off.
Inspect them closely and look for
a way to deactivate them!"

"/face2 Alright! Every time bomb is down for
the count. Great job!"

"That explosion was off the charts!
Are you alright?"

"Only half the bombs to go!
Keep it up, you're doing great!"
"Only one left!"

"You've put a stop to that one!
Deactivation was a success!"

"Hmm, looks like something went wrong.
But you'll have to wait a bit before you can
try it again..."

"You've only got 30 seconds left!
Please hurry!"

"/face2 What perfect timing! We're right in the
middle of a darker time bomb deactivation
operation! Care to lend a hand?"
